articles.description: India has announced a diplomatic boycott of the Beijing Winter Olympics. What does this mean? Does it affect athletes' participation? Why have the Beijing Winter Games been so controversial?
articles.content: By doing so, India has joined a growing list of countries that will not send government delegations to the Chinese capital for the Winter Olympics. In December, the United States had announced a dipl… [+6480 chars]
